11121121.content:
So full, your tummy stretched so taught, you lull into a soft sleep. You brain almost sags into the folds of unconsciousness when the breath of a growl on your face.

Your lift your heavy eyelids and focus your vision to see a set of very sharp very bared fangs in front of your eyes. A burgundy dragon with a slightly more muscular build then before is clearly very upset with you.

You roll up so you can face him properly. The mass inside you settles, not quite digested, but clearly given up on fighting. Your hind legs barely touch the ground underneath your underbelly.

Your new challenger cranes his thick neck around you to look at you gut. You think you see him chuckle at the way your backpaws are touching the ground gingerly, but his eyes, his eyes say something besides 'funny.'

You didn't see it coming, but you feel the swipe of his claw against your muzzle, just above your lip. With a single beat of his wings, he retreats, in a clear invitation to fight. You growl and narrow your eyes to slits and rush forward. Or rather, you intend to rush forward.

Instead, to your chagrin and surprise, you seem to roll forward, your back half resting on the upper curve of your stomach, your back legs stuck up in the air, your face straight in the dirt.

Okay, if he wasn't laughing before, he's sure as dirt laughing now.

He unfolds his wings again and beats them, rising a little each time. He flies up to five or sixth dragon-lengths into the air. At his apex he gives one mighty beat of wings and curves down into a dive, straight at you. He opens his mouth.

It is in the moment right at the top of his flight, when your see both fangs and eyes, that it all becomes clear. You recognize the shape of his face, and the color of his eyes. In your last meal. You must have eaten his younger brother.

It is in an instant, and happens without thought. His mouth opens. The wind howls underneath him. His aim is at your neck. You react.

You push on the ground and roll up again, now resting on the bottom curve, sitting on your hunches, and you form a straight line with your upper body. Aimed at him, or, more, him aimed at you.

You open your mouth as wide as you can, bearing through the pain for even just a few more centimeters. He claws at the air, unable to think fast enough to stop himself.

You feel an indescribable but understandable feeling in your mouth and gullet accompanied with a sort of a *thwomp* sound. His head and neck are down your throat and his upper chest is now stretching out your muzzle. your tongue runs over his pectoral muscles, and it become very clear - they taste the same.

You inhale what little you can through your nose, hold it, and brace yourself. He struggles, and it whips your face around by the neck. Your eyes are closed, so you can only imagine what his body is actually doing. You cannot see or smell. You can only hear and feel. And taste.

What you do know is the weight of the body has bowed your neck over your stomach, ruining that straight line. You gulp as hard as you can, and bring him in more. you can feel his underbelly in your mouth, his abdominal muscles writhing as he twists in an increasingly futile attempt at liberation.

You continue greedily gulping away, hoping your body has enough room inside your stomach for a couple of brothers, one your size and the other even bigger! Eventually you make it to the hips (and suddenly realizing you have no idea how you consumed the wings, but, dang it, their the are in your mouth) and feel his head enter your stomach.

You pause a second to savor the mental image of the head that moments before grinned at you entering the chamber that held his former sibling. With most of the weight expanding your chest you can now lift your neck again point your head into the air, so that his legs were now straight into your gullet.

You need not gulp anymore, at this point he just slides into you, and now only a long tail is outside, poking out one side of your lips. You could open your eyes but you don't, using your imagination to feel and picture the burgundy dragon entering you completely. You stomach surges and swells, almost inflating. He swishes and struggles heartily from inside, and you groan from the pleasure as you stroke as much of your engorgement as your claws can reach.

When he seems to slow down and curl up, you open your eyes, the light blinding for the first second. You then smile a sopsid grin. You roll forward off your haunches in an attempt to get on all fours, but immediately realize the mistake; your back feet don't come close to touching the ground when your front feet hit. the contents of your gigantic stomach swish and then settle, and you paw with your backlegs, your spine bent as your head lays on the ground. You give up trying to get in a different position and decide that this is find, and once again try to find that most elusive sleep.

111211221122111.content:
"Let me take you home to me." She said and started to walk away to her cave. She was only getting a few feet before she heard the male dragon say. "Uhm, a little help please?"

Looking back she realized just how big he actually was. Having swallowed an entire other male dragon twice his size, (even when he had been stuffed full himself) had given him a stomach so big that it had pinned to the ground and was literally blocking all of his sights. Walking up next to his face the female dragon could see a slight blush in his cheeks as he once more asked nicely for help. "I think I might have some difficulties moving." He said and tried to give her little puppy dog eyes. She giggled a little at his pleads and said, "Sure." and then she grabbed his tail in her mouth and started dragging him to her home.

He was really surprised in her strengths. Her she was dragging a male that had an even huger male inside of him like it was just a sack of potatoes. It wasn't at a fast pace, but she never seemed to ever slow down when she dragged him.

Once they reached the cave where she lives in she stopped. Trying and failing to look around the male dragon asks why they aren't inside yet, and she responds with "I think the cave might be to small for you." This made the male a little scared since being outside in his state would mean that any dragon that was bigger then him could easily eat him. "A-Are you sure? You don't think I could fit if you just tried to force me in?" "It's always worth a shot." The female said and walked up to his head. "Why do you get over here?" He asked. "If I tried to pull your tail and you get stuck then I will be trapped inside, and you will have no one to defend you." The female said. "Are you saying that you would actually stay behind and protect me?" The male said surprised. "Of course I would want to protect you." She said and gave him a light kiss on his cheek, making him blush once again.

With the help of her pushing and him jiggling his fat they manage to do some progress. The first part of him (His tail and his hind legs) where easy, but the real challenge came with his dragon filled middle. It had been a while since he ate that other dragon, (and it had digested somewhat) but it still looked like it might be to big to get through.

Halfway though they reached the part of his belly that was the most widest, and how does it go?

You prowl around the pack looking for someone to "remove" from the pack. You see a dozen cubs planning in a near by field of grass, some young lions getting ready for the hunt this afternoon, and some lioness passing gossip back and forward. All and all nothing seemed to have been catching your eye until you finally found them.

Within the the hunting group there were two lions horribly or of breath; Yellow Tip and Hisou. Yellow Tip was the oldest of the hunting group, his fur was bleached white except for his tail; the reason door his name. Due to his age, he has been recently slacking in his practice. Not that laying around is that bad for yourself. He has also been eating most of the meat before it could even arrive back at the pack, making nice and plump.

Hisou on the other hand was performing below average compared to the rest, even Yellow Tip. He had tan fur like most of the pack with some patches of brown. He is still learning how to hunt with the others, but he has been practicing for the last four years. The cubs he was with earlier have all gone out and created their own hunting groups within the pack. A poor representation of a hunter doesn't belong in your pack.

Over rocks and gazelles and the various animals, a signal of the ultimate progression of life and time, the day begins.

A rocky outjutting in the fields forms a cave, from which a pride of lions has thrived for centuries. You are a young male cub, and, lying on your right side, your head is just outside of the cave so that you can be the first to feel the sun on your fur, golden as sunset aura. It takes you a second to wake up, but when you realize that it's morning, and once again, it's time to play, your youthful jubilance returns and you run, bounding through the meadowlands at whatever suits your whim. Wolves aren't exactly known for poping their own kind like pez, but that doesn't mean they still aren't carnivores. I bet more than a few would like a warm meal and a better shot at that one certain wolf or wolfess of their dreams.

Luckily we just happen to have a few of those hungry puppys right here.
13.title: Wolf choices

choices: the weakest pack
the strongest pack
the pack with enough females for everyone
131.content:
You yawn as you ponder recent events; currently you are the top wolf of your pack, but rival packs are getting slightly daring due to their misconception that you are weak because you are fat. staring at your rather globular gut you smile as you rub it, it is a sign of how well you are capable of getting sustenance.

suddenly your close friend, a slightly smaller wolf (in height, length, and width) he smiles at you, bows slightly in respect, and says, "you know sir, I do believe that I have come up with an intriguing and humorous way to dispatch our rivals, gather more members for our pack, and actually acquire more than a pawfull of females. Plus, it'll boost your reputation greatly amongst other packs."

"are you serious?" You ask your friend.

"quite." he replies with a quick nod and then adds, "It will utilize your amazing abilities to conquer our foes, gather allies, etc. oh! might I add it will give you a chance to eat more, to the point you may be almost immobile!"

"how can I possibly lead our pack if I myself can't even hunt?" you ask, somewhat glumly, yet you obviously drool at the notion of more food.

"due to your incredible ability to consume large prey whole, I decided, that we can challenge other packs, and when their leader challenges you, you simply gobble him up like you would normal prey!"

"you mean to suggest... eating our own kind?"

"yes, it is slightly... unethical, but if we challenge the strong, yet unliked packs, we will win favor, and by forcing the losers to comply with us, or else face similar punishment, they will join our ranks! Plus, you are such a kind leader, you will earn their trust quite easily, and so the females from their packs will join us as well, and we have so few that it would be icing on the cake, so to speak."

"more like icing on the enemy!" you joke, "fine! but where should we start?" you ask.
131.title: the tubby pack leader

choices: Eat him now
Wait for it...
1311.content:
Before you begin on your soon-to -be empire, you feel you should test it out first. The pack nearest to yours, is the weakest one in the area, perfect test subjects.
You lie in the underbrush, waiting for the scout their pack sends daily. It is nearly high noon before you catch a glimps of him. The wolf is grey, like yourself, but young, and strong. Your mouth begins to water.
1311.title: the weakest pack

choices: The next day
13111.content: With a mighty bound, you pounce, and pin the slightly smaller wolf to the ground. He barley has time to say anything before you clamp your wide Maw over his head. You begin to swallow his struggling body, enjoying every second. All that hangs out of your mouth is his lower body. He continues to fight for his life, up untill when you completely swallow the last of him. Your sagging belly sways as he thrashes about. You belch, and begin to walk home as the young wolf digests.
13111.title: Eat him now

choices: Eat Him
He manages to eat you
131111.content: You wake up the next day with a much flatter belly then the day before. The young wolf that was inside has digested into mush and fat to help fuel your body. You loved the feeling of another wolf struggling inside of you that you needed more of it. You feel that its time to use your ability to take down the leader of the weak pack. You silently go back to their land and try to find the leader. After a few minutes of searching, you find your prey. A medium size wolf that is fit a strong but also looks very delicious. He is by himself so you now is your time to strike. You quietly sneak up on the leader and pounce at him.
131111.title: The next day

choices: Head into the woods-see what you can find (May encounter non-wolf anthros)
Go into the hills-there are usually at least one or two wolves up there...
132.content:
You are Tundra, a massive, shapely wolfess.
You stand at 8 feet tall, with breasts the size of watermelons, a slightly smaller rear, and powerful muscles, making you look like one of the legendary Amazons. Your eyes are a brilliant green, and your fur is gun-metal grey.
It's mating season in the Vancouver wilderness you call home, and your fellow anthro wolves are all looking for mates. One of the most common ways to ensure that one will get a mate is to devour your rivals: this way, there is a greater chance of finding an available mate, with the added bonus of growing your body. You are well-versed in this practice, and you are about to set off to find either a mate or a meal...
What do you do?
132.title: A big powerful amazonian female adult

choices: At the point where is belly hinders his ways to move
Till he is too obese to move
more weights at wich to fatten youre brother before he's you're meal
134.content:
You awake and get up making sure that none of you're brothers or sisters. You strech as you exit the den you were sleeping in and warmed yourself in the summers sun. you are a female wolf pup that has a considerable amount of baby fat that has always been on you, Though that is expected from the pack leaders daughter. You were always the gluttonous type even when you were feeding from youre mother you would push youre brother and sister out of the way to get more milk. When you moved to meats you would eat more than the cubs and were able to convince youre parents to give you more food but now they decided to stop giving you more food.right nkw while sunning yourself an idea came to mind that was really crafty.

         You had the idea that n if you could get one of the other wolf cubs to fatten up then eat them. You think but who, while thinking you were interrupted by you're name being called "Koko" you heard your mother yell and rushed inside." I just want to see where you are" youre mother said." OK" you were about to leave when you spot an option for you're plan. You're brother Temo.

         You ran outside to plot how to fatten much to fatten you're brother before you decide to eat him. Fattening him was not a problem since he had some fat on him because like you he also was a big eater. You think of two weights at which the young wolf would be good to eat at and that is
134.title: A female pup with some cute baby fat

choices: slow weight gain
Force feeding (short 2 weeks)
force feed  (long 1 month)
1342.content: You think of a few weights that would be good to fatten your brother to but one keeps pushing its way back into you're head and that is to fatten the little wolf cub till he is to fat to move. Now all you have to do is think of how to fatten him up. You come across two options the first is to slowly feed him. If you slowly feed him it will be less of a suspicion and you get to see how he fills out. The next is a lot quicker and you don't really have to see the middle results just the end one, the option is to force feed you're brother a ton of food every day for two weeks ensuring that he will not only be stuffed but also fat. You also have a third option but it would probably fatten him up more than what you planned but it may work. You're last plan was to force feed him for a whole month and then eat him once the month is up. You think this over and choose..
1342.title: Till he is too obese to move

choices: option 1
option 2
13422.content:
You decided that waiting for the soon to be not so little pup to fatten up would take to long. You decided to force feed the pup the meat since it was faster and it also would be more efficient for you. You're desired time frame for the fattening would be about two weeks. You plotted for the rest of the day on how to feed you're brother and figured that you would lead him to a cave and force feed meat every day. You first you have to decide how to lure Temo out.


option 1 Forcefully drag you're brother noticeably out of the den.

option 2 Lure him out of den. (non forcefully)
13422.title: Force feeding (short 2 weeks)

choices: A Bull orca, eating the other males, and sowing your oats
A Cow Orca, Eliminating any other target for boys to get on with
A fem, a Black Widower too, They sow, you eat em..
A hedonist, Mate everything and eat it all, kids are dangerous
Devoured and Abused by another male.
14.content: Hunter of The Deep, all fear you, It is time to secure your rights as dominate above all your kind. There is only one way.. Eliminate the competion.. or more. Thoughts race through your mind, digested orcas tell no tales. You plot will allow you to do whatever you wish. You make a toothy smile. How many black fins will pass your lips as you start your master plan?
14.title: The Death Beneath the Seas

choices: Fill your belly with the Orca Meat ahead of you
Fufil another need that makes itself known around your tail
141.content:
Your eyes blink open, a deep hunger running through your body, you lean ans leak body, unfed for days. you have been thinking.. Thinking isn't
what your best at, but simple math tells you that if a cow is already bearing another Orcas young, you can't plug in your own superior seed,
You test your sonar, nothing. You also think that the only way a cow can be ruined as such is if they run into another male like you.. well..
no one is like you, but one with the same basic shape and body organs. You jet through the artic sea, your plan is so simple, most males you
meet have no idea about fighting when it's not the season, thats the time you plan to get them. Take there bodies as yours... You smile widely,
your toothy grin showing your hunger. You lick your upper lip once, the Sonar has picked something up, an Orca male. Your belly rumbles, your hungry.. in so many ways. You close in, sniffing the water, you smell it, young.. just reached adult hood a season ago. and small.. a runt. you lick your lips.. maybe a runt, but a risk to lucking out on a cow... your first target.. for sure.Your spout once and dive. Finally making visual contact, it's fleeing, you chase, catching it will be a matter of moments.
141.title: Bull Orcas first longings and Hungers

choices: Anthro
Non-anthro
142.content: Ok, so do you want an anthro specimen, or a non-anthro?
142.title: A Cow Orca, Eliminating any other target for bo...

choices: Anthro
Feral
143.title: A fem, a Black Widower too, They sow, you eat em..

info.brief_description: The consumption of other furs of your species to increase your chances.
info.description:
This is a Eating your own interactive, the vast majority of the focus should be one the same species interaction,Eating the males/females of the species(other things are welcome too, Such as a male eating a bellow average female out of frustration)
For the most part
Males eat other males(competion in the Gene Pool)
Females eat other females(And males to sometimes, black widower type after all you don't need them after the fact)
Hedonistic, Eat everyone, Use them for whatever pleasures you have first, you don't care really aobut the gene pool.(Might combine with the male one if I chose to have both male and female victim options
And of course victims, for those of you liking the other end

As many meals as you want, play as you wish. But everything is the same species. Enjoy yourself, eat nice and slow and detail always is nice
Pretty much anything goes, since it has a high rating there I'm not going to be a stickler for much
